panels.content:
#### AmLight-ExP Link Utilization Visualization

The following charts display real time link utilization of the links that connect South America to the U.S.

##### AmLight-ExP Links via Atlantic

The following graphs shows the traffic rate for incoming and outgoing data through AmLight-ExP's 10G and 100G links from Miami to Sao Paulo/Brazil.

Click on the graph title to see more options.

panels.title: 10G Link from Miami to Sao Paulo via Atlantic Ocean
100G Link Miami to Sao Paulo via Atlantic Ocean
10G Link from Miami to Santiago via Pacific Ocean
100G Link from Miami to Sao Paulo via Pacific Ocean

panels.content:
##### AmLight-ExP Links via Pacific 

The following graphs shows the traffic rate for incoming and outgoing data through AmLight-ExP's 10G and 100G links from South America to Miami via Pacific Ocean. 

Click on the graph title to see more options.

##### AmLight-ExP Terrestrial Links


These links connected Sao Paulo to Santiago, Chile.

Click on graph's title to see more details.

panels.title: 10G Link from Sao Paulo to Santiago - Terrestrial
100G Link from Sao Paulo to Santiago - Terrestrial (Being Activated)

panels.content:
##### AmLight-ExP Uplinks to Academic Upstreams

These links use Florida Lamdba Rail. The 10G AtlanticWave link is a MPLS virtual circuit and the 100G AtlanticWave link is an Alien Wave. FLRNet is a connection to FLR members.  

Click on graph's titles to see more details.

#### Forwarding Statistics

AmLight-ExP supports SDN circuits and VLAN-based circuits. These charts show the number of OpenFlow entries installed and the number of VLANs created.

### SuperComputing 2017 Circuits

CenturyLink provided 100G circuits from Miami to Denver

panels.content:
##### Traffic Per Day
This graph shows the total traffic, in TB, passing through our switches by day.

##### Packets Collected
This graph shows the number of packets collected within the given timeframe.

panels.description: Number of sflow packets collected and stored in selected time frame.
panels.title: Records Collected

panels.content:
##### Packet Collection Rate
This graph shows the rate at which sflow packets come through the switch and are collected by the elasticsearch server.
